movie_night.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills (TV)
Down and Out in Beverly Hills

score.title: The Good Lives
paragraphs: Palm tree-lined streets. Glittering beaches, movie star neighbors— Beverly Hills, California.

You all lead lives of fabulous luxury and wealth. Armani handbags, Louboutin shoes, jewelry by Neil Lane, personal chefs, the best bodies money can buy—you have it all. You’re living the southern Califonia dream. Your days are spent shopping on Rodeo Drive and your nights revolve around dining with your girlfriends at the trendy hot spot du jour.
Either that, or you clean up the mess those people leave behind.

Regardless, the glamorous life isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. The mansion’s almost in foreclosure, your financial advisors are running a Ponzi scheme, and the your philandering husband is banging the nanny. You can’t lose it all now. If only there was some way to make all your problems disappear... forever.

elements: "Our girls are in the same grade at The Marlborough School"

Acrimoniously divorced, constantly at each other's throats

Eventual heirs to the Holdenkampf fortune

elements: Secret lovers, one wants to go public

relationships.title: Work
elements: A pair of one-credit IMDB pages
Life coach and work in progress

needs.title: To Get Back Your Groove
elements: ...by a personal actualization regimen involving kale
...by moving a surprising amount of cocaine
...by maxing out all of that lousy cheater's credit cards
...by getting freaky with the pool boy

needs.title: To Get Famous
elements: ...by getting people to think you're already famous
...by doing something outrageous on a reality show

needs.title: To Get Rich
elements: ...collecting on a hefty life insurance policy
...dragging a dying fiancé to the altar
...launching a new and completely untested product
...selling cut-rate time shares in a down market

needs.title: To cover up
elements: ...the name of the real baby daddy
...that your family's not really dead. They live in a trailer in the Ozarks.
...the whereabouts of your daughter's missing prescriptions
